definition.text: Now, the Github Program rewards you with more tokens for helping developers find Superalgos on Github.com search!

paragraphs.text: Add the Github Program from the menu of the Onboarding Programs node.
There are three things you can help with! Doing all three may land you up to SA 3,000 more!
Give a star to the Superalgos repository.
Fork the Superalgos repository to your Github account â€” you probably have already!
Go to the Superalgos repo to click the Star and Watch buttons. Make sure you have a fork too!->github.com/Superalgos/Superalgos
